body:
$SPY $DJIA $QQQ $AAPL $TSLA  
 
I hope the average American eventually wakes up to the fact that FED-sponsored inflation is "stickiest" in asset prices. And we all know who own the VAST majority of assets. 
 
Not only does inflation not hurt the wealthy, it actually INCREASES their wealth relative to the rest of us. We get poorer they get richer. 
 
But JPOW still tell you the central bank's policy of free money and low interest rates is not contributing to wealth inequality here in America. 
 
Wake up dumbohead Americans...you are losing ground every year to the wealth class here in America.

$PIK the kids' Stitch Fix?, 
Order your kids clothes by the box. 100 bucks an outfit head to toe. 

$LCID the buy in the teens was a gimme, buy in lo 20's was a gimmie. Company has mega cash & a beautiful car. Who would u say their competion is? well everyone but mainly Tesla 

$BCRX  the bounce back from 11.5 was fast & fierce.  I know the old company the vaccine for swine/bird flue. Anybody want to write in the thread whats going on now for such buy conviction?

$VERB  Verb is launching an ecommerce site w/its niche Live Streaming. In jan21 verb launched a product for clients to conduct Private Live streams, 3mm downloads & 75 enterprise mlm clients. Heres a look if not familar

https://youtu.be/lpvFxCdvSjk

In Nov'20 put together a Beta site for control testing,  closed it in nov'21.

https://www.shoppopup.tv

Previewed final product
https://youtu.be/c5xKOK6VhZg

$AAPL 's Streaming producer David Meltzer joined Verb as producer of Verbtv shoppable content.
Waiting for 1st live stream Promo Event.

body: $SPY $AAPL $MSFT  HUGE LIMIT DOWN. I know i cant believe it eather. My guess maybe a 30% cpi. 🧐🤯🥴🤮😭😭😭 im sorry guys. I should have said something sooner.
$STUDY $AAPL $AMD $BA  I am clueless

$WIMI 🔥🔥🔥After decades of dividends, the Internet has also hit a bottleneck.💎💎 Now Metaverse is just in time to help the Web break out of its traffic doldrums. In addition to the capital market's praise of Metaverse, what is more important is the in-depth layout of Metaverse by the head giants. In China, Tencent, WIMI and $BIDU are the representatives, while in the US, $FB and $AAPL are the representatives. They have expressed their love for Metaverse in different ways.

$SPY $DWAC $AAPL $BTC.X This debt clock just jumped a trillion overnight and is now almost $30 trillion.  How is the Fed going to raise interest rates now?  Also look at debt to GDP ratios ☠️
It’s time to fire Nancy Pelosi and Mr. Joe Biden 🤡50 plus years in Congress and the USA debts keep ripping higher
@Atrophied better than $AAPL snd $AMZN and $GOOG

$AAPL KNOW your patterns :)
$BA $AMD $STUDY

$SPY everywhere you look or go cases of covid are fkn out of control. I'm not even taking about the news etc. Just in the community, any community something is affected to one extend. And some how...is priced in? 🙄🤔 Tf... I have a feeling when the floor gives... Is going to be an epic dump.
$QQQ $AAPL $TSLA $NVDA

$AAPL was analyzed by 49 analysts. The buy consensus is at 84%. So analysts seem to be very confident about $AAPL. https://www.chartmill.com/stock/analyzer/stock/AAPL?view=analyst-ratings&utm_source=stocktwits&utm_medium=ANALYST&utm_content=AAPL&utm_campaign=social_tracking

$SPY $QQQ $TSLA $AAPL All these innovations like internet, smart phones, and technology have benefitted baby boomers retirements greatly.  What innovation do new investors have now?  Nothing as life changing as the invention of the internet or automobiles.  Electric cars are replacing gas cars so it’s not new business growth.  Apple has not created anything major new since the iphone.  It’s going to be an uphill climb for this new generation of investors entering a high priced market with high inflation.

$AAPL expecting the run up to
Earnings again and again it’s like clock work
$AAPL Recap: Expecting higher highs here. Personal target near $178 prior to earnings. $180 isn’t out of reach, however.
$AAPL will apple form that second shoulder here on the daily around $180 before it falls to $160. That’s the real question.
New ratings for International Paper( $IP ), Apple( $AAPL ),… https://www.macroaxis.com/invest/marketRatings?s=IP,AAPL,HOG,BSX,DNB,EOG,M,ROST,PNC #canada #canadian_equities #CA

links.title: Digital Advice For IP,AAPL,HOG,BSX,DNB,EOG,M,ROST,PNC
links.description: Macroaxis provides instant equity rating based on a combination of real-time fundamental analysis and risk-adjusted market performance. The results are broken down into six separate categories that are weighted to derive a horizon-based digital recommendation. The six categories are Volatility, Hype Condition, Valuation, Analyst Consensus, Financial Leverage, and Odds of Distress.

@investclem1682 sorry but dollar is lowered and its well established that a weaker dollar = stronger assets. $aapl you dont need to investigate as the thesis has been debunked already. 
Markets rallied because there was no surprise, and they know they have 2 months to rug pull. Earnings season is what is propping up the market.

body: $SPY $QQQ $COST $AAPL Prepared for some red but happy I got skin in the game if it goes the other way
Stock market outlook: Fed rate hikes won't end bull market — Fundstrat - Business Insider $QQQ $SPY $AAPL $TSLA $NVDA  https://apple.news/AZvLnFNjXRUCJNvlTH7lLqg

links.title: Stock market outlook: Fed rate hikes won't end bull market - Fundstrat - Business Insider
links.description: Interest rate hikes by the Federal Reserve don't end bull markets, according to Fundstrat. But a 10% sell-off in the stock market is likely as the Fed prepares for its first increase since 2018. "Rate hikes don't end the bull market, but the market generally pauses around the first hike," Fundstrat's Tom Lee said.
